snippet.title: Judgment | Combat Trailer (EN UK)
snippet.description:
Takayuki Yagami isn't only a force to be reckoned with in court, as is evidenced by his graceful but brutal fighting ability!

Pre-order Judgment today and receive a static theme and 4-days early access!

https://store.playstation.com/en-gb/product/EP0177-CUSA13197_00-JUDGMENTPREORDER

Judgment releases on 25th June, 2019, exclusively on PS4.
